short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Guardian US covering American and international news for an online, global audience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Guardian US is covering American and international news for an online, global audience, and this News Notifier makes sure you don't miss anything of that. 

The main feature and purpose of this browser news notifier is to follow The Guardian US website so you didn't miss anything important from the US and International news, events, opinions.
